flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=310>>310 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 310 + 35 = <<310+35=345>>345 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 345 - 15 = 330 books
#### 330

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 310. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
